text.div:
Language preference type

This value set defines the set of codes for describing the type or mode of the patient's preferred language.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/language-preference-type defines the following codes:

Code Display Definition
verbal verbal The patient prefers to verbally communicate with the associated language.
written written The patient prefers to communicate in writing with the associated language.

name: LanguagePreferenceType
title: Language preference type
description: This value set defines the set of codes for describing the type or mode of the patient's preferred language.

concept.definition: The patient prefers to verbally communicate with the associated language.
The patient prefers to communicate in writing with the associated language.
